content:
ValidateRequestMode Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of request validation for a control.

In this Article

public enum ValidateRequestMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ValidateRequestMode

Remarks

For more information about request validation, see UnvalidatedRequestValues.

Fields

Disabled

Request validation is disabled.
Enabled

Request validation is enabled.
Inherit

Request validation uses the same behavior as its parent control.
